name: Wayward Axe
description:
"I've seen enough battles to know when to use this and when to use diplomacy."
—Tactician Sebastian

name: Black Earth Trident
description:
"The Priory sent us this shipment of underwater weapons. Must have been a mix-up somewhere."
—Magister Roslin

name: Drakkar Speargun
description:
"Even the depths require much."
—Worthy Burden

name: Valoric Greatsword
description:
"Its not the sword that's great, but who wields it."
—Pact Crusader D'Stolt

name: Blue Ice Hammer
description:
"Sometimes you must break something in order to rebuild it."
—Guard Splintering Serenity

name: Valoric Warhorn
description:
"You can hear this from the highest peaks"
—Pact Crusader D'Stolt

name: Wayward Axe
description:
"I've seen enough battles to know when to use this and when to use diplomacy."
—Tactician Sebastian

name: Black Earth Speargun
description:
"The Priory sent us this shipment of underwater weapons. Must have been a mix-up somewhere."
—Magister Roslin

name: Valoric Sword
description:
"Blasphemy like that of the svanir needs to be cut from this world."
—Crusader D'Stolt

name: Inka Scepter
description:
"Those imps love magic almost as much I do."
—Scholar Inka

name: Valoric Longbow
description:
"The first arrow I shot was from a bow such as this. Nevermind about that. That was a long time ago."
—Pact Crusader D'Stolt

name: Mokooki Long Bow
description:
"Keeps the bad ice away."
—Mokooki

name: De Molish Axe
description:
"The natural law of combat is to attack your enemy until they stop attacking you."
—Explorer Brokkar

name: Shifting Dagger
description:
"The smallest fang can cause the deadliest wound."
—Shifting Waves

name: Black Earth Harpoon
description:
"The Priory sent us this shipment of underwater weapons. Must have been a mix-up somewhere."
—Magister Roslin

name: Arundon Torch
description:
"Only one permanent way to cleanse this vile evil."
—Explorer Erikk

name: Shifting Trident
description:
"Always flow like the current in order to crash like a wave."
—Shifting Waves

name: Wyrmblood Warhorn
description:
"You can't ignore this land's plea to protect it from the legendary evil."
—Toka Axegrinder

description:

—Toka Axegrinder

name: Dostoev Hammer
description:
"Though known for their use of sonic weapons, dredge sometimes rely on less sophisticated weaponry."
—Priory Field Guide to Dredge

name: Inka Staff
description:
"The very staff I modified in order to determine the mystic harmonics originating from the stones."
—Scholar Inka

name: De Molish Mace
description:
"If you're hit, the natural reaction is to hit back. Harder."
—Explorer Brokkar

name: Black Earth Harpoon
description:
"The Priory sent us this shipment of underwater weapons. Must have been a mix-up somewhere."
—Magister Roslin

name: Drakkar Mace
description:
"We must each bring balance in our own ways."
—Worthy Burden

name: Balance Harpoon
description:
"This is but a tool of a greater machine."
—Guardian Infinite Mind

name: Granite Staff
description:
"We had to see what would happen if you created a weapon using some of the ore."
—Arcanist Vance

name: Patient Sword
description:
"What they lack in common sense, they make up for in their ability to collect scraps. In this case, magical scraps."
—Scholar Antal the Patient

name: Inka Focus
description:
"Sometimes you to need to invent your own scientific method. I call mine 'The Alchemical Method of Summoning Stones, by Inka.' It's a little wordy, but then, so am I."
—Scholar Inka
